sentences.english: Like carp, crucian carp, also known as Africa.
sentences.chinese: 形似鲫鱼，又称非洲鲫鱼。

sentences.english: Like carp, crucian carp, also known as Africa.
sentences.chinese: 形似鲫鱼，又称非洲鲫鱼。

sentences.english: Perhaps you might like a silver carp soup.
Carp back and three pit hole to arrive, with the most dangerous carp back.
sentences.chinese: 鲫鱼背和三个石洞才能抵达，其中以鲫鱼背最险。

sentences.english: Carp back and three pit hole to arrive, with the most dangerous carp back.
sentences.chinese: 鲫鱼背和三个石洞才能抵达，其中以鲫鱼背最险。

sentences.english: On the way up，you can see a cliff called Jiyu Bei.
sentences.chinese: 往上去，你们会看到一道被称作“鲫鱼背”的悬崖。

sentences.english: He said the cliff was called Jiyu Bei，which means Carp's Backbone.
sentences.chinese: 他说那座悬崖叫作“鲫鱼背”，意思就是鲫鱼的脊背。

sentences.english: He said the cliff was called Jiyu Bei，which means Carp's Backbone.

sentences.english: May I suggest a gold carp soup?
Carp necessary fuel before it is best to remove its throat teeth.
sentences.chinese: 故鲫鱼下锅前最好是去掉其咽喉齿。

sentences.english: Most of crucian carp, lives in in running water wild.
sentences.chinese: 大部分是鲫鱼，没命地在湍急的流水中撒野。

sentences.english: Some of the famous dishes are pork shreds with fish seasoning, chicken cubes with chili peppers, and spicy braised crucian carp.
sentences.chinese: 一些著名的菜肴如鱼香肉丝，辣子鸡丁，干烧鲫鱼。
